description: Default project constitution principles for DoD/Gov systems (ADR D158)

default_principles.text: All user-facing APIs must enforce authentication (CAC/PIV for DoD, MFA minimum)
All data at rest and in transit must use FIPS 140-2/3 validated encryption
All changes must maintain append-only audit trail (NIST AU controls)
CUI markings must be present on all generated artifacts
No feature may degrade existing ATO boundary without ISSO review
All features must include acceptance criteria with testable assertions
All external integrations must have defined error handling and circuit breaker patterns
All containers must run as non-root with read-only root filesystem
Dependencies must be auditable and air-gap installable
All features must be accessible (WCAG 2.1 AA minimum for UI)
